description: Converts latitude & longitude in datatable columns to location names.

input.name: mapboxApiKey
input.description: A Mapbox API key from https://www.mapbox.com/.

input.name: data
input.description: The datatable containing the latitude & longitude columns to be converted.

input.name: placeType
input.description:
The type of geographic location available in the Mapbox geocoder. Valid options are `country`, `region`, `postcode`, `district`, `place`, `locality`, `neighborhood`, `address`, and `poi`.
 If unspecified, defaults to `country`.

input.name: longitudeColumn
input.description:
The name of the column containing longitude values (in decimal degrees).
A plus sign (+) denotes east longitude, and a minus sign (-) denotes west longitude.
If unspecified, defaults to `longitude`.

input.name: latitudeColumn
input.description:
The name of the column containing latitude values (in decimal degrees).
A number preceded by a sign character. A plus sign (+) denotes northern hemisphere, and a minus sign (-) denotes southern hemisphere.
If unspecified, defaults to `latitude`.

input.name: resultColumn
input.description: The name of the column to contain location output.

output.name: data
output.description: A datatable with the location names added.
